page.title: 06HOUSEWIFE'S DAY
page.content: We get up at 7.45 give the children breakfast,get washed and dressed. At 9 I walk my son to school and my 3 year old daughter to playschool.I either stay to help or I walk back home with the dog,wash and tidy up the house. Then if necessary I drive into Cirencester to get groceries etc., returing by 11.30 to collect my daughter from playschool. 12.30 lunch after which I do some more housework and entertain various toddlers.3pm I collect my son then cook the dinner (if winter I first stoke the Rayburn). We eat about 5.30.Children baths followed by bedtime about 7.Then I relax /read/do exercises/watch T.V. and go to bed about 11 pm.
